desc: Our primary focus is mothers with young children. Some of our products include milestone blankets, 3D wooden name signs, 3D puzzles, 3D hologram crystal keepsakes, and comfort blankets. As well as products that promote self love such self affirmation mirrors, encouraging posters/keychains/magnets, and throw rugs.

layout.text: We are a Mommy & Me brand that creates personalized products with goals to uplift mothers by ensuring them that they can live past their trauma, to empower young girls with self love/acceptance, and to help celebrate life/family on holidays and special events in the most creative of ways.
